quote_first: And I could hear that there were fewer people in the little station when the train wasn't there, so I opened my eyes and I looked at my watch and it said
quote_last: and I had been sitting on the bench for approximately 5 hours but it hadn't seemed like approximately 5 hours, except that my bottom hurt and I was hungry and thirsty.
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon
